simplerjogl
Class Frame

java.lang.Object
  simplerjogl.Frame
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShellFrame
public class Frame
extends java.lang.Object

A class to display a Swing window containing an OpenGL canvas, based closely on Pepijn Van Eeckhoudt's work for the NeHe JOGL Demo Ports< /a>.

Version:
2008-08-06
Author:
Pepijn Van Eeckhoudt, Seth Battis

Method Detail

createFrame

public static Frame createFrame(java.lang.String title,
                                boolean fullscreen)
Statically create an instance of the window frame, querying user to run fullscreen

Parameters:
title - window title
fullscreen - true to attempt running fullscreen, false to run windowed

start

public void start()
Activate window frame and start animation loop

stop

public void stop()
Quit the program when the window frame is closed
